name: v2025.09.14 - Fix intelligent recommendations JSON/CORS hardening
body:
- Fix HTTP 500 when generating intelligent recommendations
- Harden JSON parsing with request.get_json(silent=True) and 400 on invalid/absent JSON
- Robust smoking parser (accepts dict/string/flattened fields, normalizes statuses, safe cast for macos_ano)
- Standardize API response shape: {"recommendations": [...], "alerts": [...]} consistently
- CORS: Proper OPTIONS (POST, OPTIONS) and response headers on POST
- Update vercel rewrites ensuring /checkup-intelligent maps to /api/checkup-intelligent.py
